home.demo: This isn't available in the demo

textBlock1.title: Made with love üíú
textBlock1.text: Here at dnd-tracker we are not of many words, but we let the product speak for itself. There are grand ideas to make it as comprehensive as possible. We started with the encounter tracker as the main idea, but more ideas were certainly added while it was in development.

summary.title: Why choose dnd-tracker for your encounters ü§î
summary.item2: Continuously working to improve the product
summary.item3: Everything for the DM in 1 handy place
summary.item5: Plenty of information you can get your hands on
summary.item6: Attractive dark mode design for all vampires among us

textBlock2.title: Weird stuff üêõ
textBlock2.text: Should you come across something strange on the website or the rules aren't 100% correct. Then don't hesitate to let us know. dnd-tracker is not a big company, but rather a group of friends who came up with this together. So if we have overlooked something, let us know and we will adjust it.
